resources.string: This service skips Video Ads, and mutes the Media audio while Ads are playing. This is a non-intrusive way to (partially) get rid of annoying Ads while watching your videos.
Audio will be muted when Ad is playing.
Audio will not be muted when Ad is playing

Follow the below instructions carefully, otherwise the app won't work.

After clicking OK, the Accessibility configuration screen will show up.
Find and enable "Ad Skipper" service.
